snippet: Bank of America Merrill Lynch and BNP Paribas have suspended two traders, according to people familiar with the matter. More than 20 traders have been suspended or fired amid inquiries into potential manipulation of the currency markets.
abstract: Bank of America Merrill Lynch and BNP Paribas have suspended two traders, according to people familiar with the matter. More than 20 traders have been suspended or fired amid inquiries into potential manipulation of the currency markets.

headline.main: Two Banks Said to Suspend Employees in Currency Investigation
